text: @realDonaldTrump Monday Morning, 2 crisis issues in this country.  Rising numbers of COVID-19 and continued protests and you have nothing to do?  Seriously?  The most important thing you can think of doing is trashing others on twitter?  WOW, JUST WOW!!!
